nodes.text: A crest was used by Barriss Offee, a female Mirialan and a member of the Jedi Order. During the Clone Wars, the symbol was featured in Offee's quarters in the Jedi Temple on Coruscant. It was emblazoned on the room's door and carpet. The design of the crest showed similarities with the winged roundel of the Jedi Order and the geometrically repeated tattoos she and her master Luminara Unduli wore on the face.

Barriss Offee's crest was designed by David Le Merrer for The Wrong Jedi, the twentieth and final episode of the Star Wars: The Clone Wars television series' fifth season. Personal emblems designed for Jedi quarters were introduced in Star Wars: Episode III Revenge of the Sith, in the form of Yoda's crest.
